claim: In Figure 9A, the sine wave tracking signals of M-UITA almost overlapped with the actual displacement, while some defects and jitters existed at the turning point.

claim: Figure 10 illustrates the tracking trajectories of each input signal.
title: Figure 10.
caption: The tracking trajectories of: (A) Pattern C compensated with M-UITA; (B) Pattern C compensated with UITA; (C) Pattern D compensated with M-UITA; (D) Pattern D compensated with UITA; (E) Pattern E compensated with M-UITA; (F) Pattern E compensated with UITA. M-UITA, Mask Ultrasonic Imaging Tracking Algorithm; UITA, Ultrasonic Imaging Tracking Algorithm.

claim: In Figure 10B, it can be observed that in Pattern C, after 70 seconds, the tracking waveform of UITA exhibits a highly unstable state.
title: Figure 10.
